pr_title: Community admin should also be considered a Collection admin

timeline.message: Community admin should also be considered a Collection admin

timeline.bodyText:
Both of these tests should be using Builder classes to create all content.  Using a Builder will ensure that the content created is automatically deleted after the test completes.  Currently, these tests are not cleaning up after themselves.
So, please update these tests to use CollectionBuilder, CommunityBuilder and EPersonBuilder.  Note that you also don't need to create the Admin group, as you can use CollectionBuilder.withAdminGroup(Eperson) instead.
timeline.author: tdonohue

timeline.bodyText:
Same here, use Builders please.
Also, for full test completion, would you be willing to add a testIsCommunityAdmin() method here...as it seems to be missing & it'd be good to also prove that a Community Admin also results in that method returning true, while a Collection Admin results in that method returning false.
timeline.author: tdonohue
